questions.text: So Friend how's the wife?.
Our king is doing great is he not?
Have you met our great wizard Melf yet?
For how long have you been an adventurer?
You've got any kids?
Have you heard of the secret dungeon underneath the castle
Have you fought the Blade Warden?
Have you heard? The Zadasi empire has stationed troops near the border
I heard that in heartwood forest there is a fairy that makes you immortal why not travel there next.
How's your horse
Hey, Look at her doesn't she look great
It's a dark and stormy night isn't it?
What do you think of my tattooes?
Are you going into battle?
How did you get into adventuring?
Do you have a moment to talk about our lord and savior Ma'tt M'rcer
Aren’t you part of the Preatorian Guard?
So you want to buy a dragon?
Have you been to the Elves yet?
Have you heard of the great explorer Edrin Goldfond?
